TopicTitle: Vessel Disappearing when crew member EVAs

Articles.Content:
Version: 0.1.2.0
Windows 11 Pro
12th Gen Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-12600K   3.70 GHz
NVIDEA GeForce RTX 3070
No mods

This has happened with 1.1 and 1.2.  First on Ike then on Minmus.

If a Kerbal EVAs some distance from the ship, the ship simply disappears.  The distance appears to be at least 2 kilometers.  I don't know if it sinks into the moon or just vanishes.  So not only is one Kerbal marooned with limited oxygen, but two others have been swallowed up by the multiverse.  Seems like a pretty shabby way to treat innocent little Kerbals.
